title: Mordekaiser's W
body: So, I know that Morde's W is getting changed in the rework, but I honestly love it mechanically, I'd love if it were put onto some sort of support/enchanter champion (without the passive part). What do you think? Would you like to see it on a support?

replies.body: It's not really a good support ability tbh unless the support has a way of gapclosing and holding the enemy down alongside it, and if it's made to have similar numbers to what Morde has, then it'll be op. The only reason it works on Morde is because he's immobile and is designed to share a lane with something like Blitzcrank so he can't really use it fully himself.
I don't see why you like it. All it is is a ruined version of his old W.
